dt-option.name: buttons.dom.button.className
dt-option.summary: Set the class name to use for the elements used to create individual button

type.description: The class name. Multiple classes can be given using space separation.

dt-option.description: This option controls the class name of the tag that that each button is comprised of. Please refer to the `b-init buttons.dom` documentation for an overview of the DOM structure that Buttons will create. In this specific case, this option controls the class name of the `...` element that is shown in the example HTML there.

example.title: DataTables initialisation: Add an additional class name to the button
Instance initialisation: Set a tag and class name
